title: Women's World Cup: You picked your England starting XI to start final v Spain
body_text:
England are gearing up for a first Women's World Cup final on Sunday when they face Spain at Stadium Australia in Sydney.
Boss Sarina Wiegman has steered the Lionesses through the competition unbeaten, seeing off co-hosts Australia with a convincing 3-1 win at the semi-final stage.
But with decisions to make before the final, and with Lauren James returning from suspension, we asked who will get the nod for Sunday's historic showdown?
You stepped into Sarina's shoes and picked your own England starting XI. Your selected team is below.
